Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: 食材屋「山の恵み」
Entry.EnglishText: Grocer

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 宿屋「蒼穹の宿」
Entry.EnglishText: Innkeeper "Azure Sky Inn"

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律か……
Entry.EnglishText: Commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか……戒律のせいで しゃべれないんだったネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh right... Can't speak because of the commandments.

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、男とは 話せないようだな……
Entry.EnglishText: It seems that you can't talk to men because of the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律……ですね。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, the Commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか、戒律が あったんだったな……
Entry.EnglishText: Man... So we really can't talk because of the Commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、女と 話せないんだったわね……
Entry.EnglishText: Because of the commandments, you aren't allowed to talk to women....

Entry.JapaneseText: 売りたそうにしているが、 戒律のせいで、異性とは 話ができないようだ。
Entry.EnglishText: He looks like he wants to sell, but because of the commandments, he can't seem to talk to the opposite sex.

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード・宿屋・食材屋
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd: Inn/Grocery Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd

Entry.JapaneseText: 宿屋・食材屋
Entry.EnglishText: Inn - Grocery Store

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃいませー。
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140> 食材を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Buy Food Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: おじいちゃんの お手伝いでーす!!
Entry.EnglishText: I'm here to help my grandpa!

Entry.JapaneseText: おじいちゃんの お手伝いでーす!!
Entry.EnglishText: I'm here to help my grandpa!

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃ……あっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Welco... Oh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、ヒューマとガジュマの 関係があまりよくないけど、 元気いっぱいです！
Entry.EnglishText: The relationship between Huma and Gajuma hasn't been so great lately, but they're still so lively!

Entry.JapaneseText: いつでも新鮮な食材で いっぱいです♪ 買っていって？
Entry.EnglishText: ♪ Always full of fresh produce! ♪ Would you like to buy some?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの人がいなくなって、 少し寂しいけど、 元気いっぱいです！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm a little sad to see Gajuma go away, but I'm keeping my head up!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマのみんなも戻ってきて、 元気いっぱいです！
Entry.EnglishText: All the Gajumas came back, and they're in high spirits!

Entry.JapaneseText: 騒動も収まって、少しずつ みんなの様子も変わって来ました！ 私もやる気いっぱいです！
Entry.EnglishText: Now that all the fuss is over, things are starting to look a little different for everyone! I'm full of motivation too!

Entry.JapaneseText: この音は……蒼獣様のお腹が 鳴ってるんだと思います！
Entry.EnglishText: That sound is... It's the sound of Mister Azure Beast's tummy rumbling!

Entry.JapaneseText: ウチの食材を食べれば、 きっと蒼獣様も元気いっぱいです！
Entry.EnglishText: If Mister Azure Beast eats our food, he'll be pepped up and full of energy!

Entry.JapaneseText: 空が変な色に変わって、 私もいっぱいいっぱいです！ で、でも……営業中です。
Entry.EnglishText: The sky is turning strange colors and it's even affecting me! B-but... We're still open for business.

Entry.JapaneseText: いつでも新鮮、 バビログラードの食材屋と いえば、うちだけよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Always fresh, we're the only grocery store in Babilograd!

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖殿のおそなえものは うちから出してるの。 イイものいっぱいです！
Entry.EnglishText: All of the offerings for the sanctuary come from our home. So much tasty food!

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃいませ。
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140> 泊まる 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Rest Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: 毎度、またどうぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you, come back again.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが近くにおると どうにも不愉快になるんじゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: I can't help but feel uncomfortable when a Gajuma approaches me...

Entry.JapaneseText: きっと蒼獣様もワシらと 同じ気持ちに違いない。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sure that the Azure Beast feels the same way.

Entry.JapaneseText: へたに近づいて、蒼獣様を 怒らせるでないぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Whatever you do, don't get too close and anger the Azure Beast!

Entry.JapaneseText: 蒼獣様は、我らヒューマの 守護者じゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: The Azure Beast is... the guardian of all Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマどもの参拝を 禁止できんもんかのう……
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if it's possible to prohibit the Gajumas from visiting the shrine...

Entry.JapaneseText: なぜガジュマがここにおる！ さっさと出て行かんか！
Entry.EnglishText: Why is there a Gajuma here? You, get the hell out of here!

Entry.JapaneseText: 祭司のような重要な仕事は 知に優れたワシらヒューマが やるべきじゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: Important duties like being a priest should be done only by intelligent Huma like myself...

Entry.JapaneseText: わからん…… ワシには何もわからん……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know... I just don't know anymore...

Entry.JapaneseText: この年になるまで、種族の事など 考えた事もなかったのに……
Entry.EnglishText: My own species had never come to mind until I got to this age...

Entry.JapaneseText: な、なんじゃこの音は…… 蒼獣様……お助けを……！
Entry.EnglishText: W-What is this sound... Please... Help the Azure Beast...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族の違いがある以上…… それをないものにはできん…… じゃが……
Entry.EnglishText: As long as there are differences in both Huma and Gajuma... We can't simply turn the other way. But...

Entry.JapaneseText: それを知った上で、新しい 関係を築く事が重要なのでは ないか……そう思うんじゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: Knowing this, it's important to build a new relationship... Atleast, that's what I feel...

Entry.JapaneseText: 蒼獣様にお参りする時は 必ず風呂に入り、身体を 清めて行くんじゃぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Whenever you visit the Azure Beast, be sure to take a bath to purify your body beforehand.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140><font:80000002><Unk17:340c>ガルドで泊りますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140><Unk17:340c> Gald to rest. Spend the night? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><font:80000002><Unk19:3404>が仲間になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><Unk19:3404> joined the party.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><font:80000002><Unk19:3410>が同行します。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><Unk19:3410> is now travelling with you.
